Class Options

  • java.lang.Object
    • Options

  • public class Options
extends java.lang.Object
    The class Options has the responsibility of letting the user select an operation and then carrying it out

    • Constructor Summary

      Options()
      Constructor for creating Options objects.
      Options(int privileges)
      Constructor for creating Options objects.

      Checks if the date is in correct format
      void reserve(int privileges)
      Intakes the appropriate information needed for a reservation and writes it to a file.
      void showOptions()
      Presents the user with a menu of commands and calls his desired command.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Options

        public Options()
        Constructor for creating Options objects. Sets the privileges to the lowest.

      • Options

        public Options(int privileges)
        Constructor for creating Options objects.
        Parameters:
        privileges - The level of privileges which let the user access appropriate commands.

    • Method Detail

      • showOptions

        public void showOptions()
        Presents the user with a menu of commands and calls his desired command.

      • reserve

        public void reserve(int privileges)
        Intakes the appropriate information needed for a reservation and writes it to a file.
        Parameters:
        privileges - which indicate if the user can set a discount.

      • isValidDate

        public boolean isValidDate(java.lang.String inDate)
        Checks if the date is in correct format
        Parameters:
        inDate - The date in a string format that is to be checked.
        Returns:
        The boolean if the date is in a valid format.
